mapper.insert: insert into comments(cm_no,rv_no,bm_no,cm_content) values((select nvl(max(cm_no),0)+1 from comments), #{rv_no}, #{bm_no}, #{cm_content})
mapper.select: select * from comments where rv_no = #{rv_no} order by cm_no desc
mapper.update: update comments set cm_content = #{cm_content} where cm_no =#{cm_no}
